name: Tommy Lee
description: '''Thomas Lee''' (born '''Thomas Lee Bass'''; [[Greek language|Greek]]: Τόμας Λι Μπας, October 3, 1962) is an American musician, best known as the co-founder and drummer of [[Heavy metal music|heavy metal]] band [[Mötley Crüe]]. He also founded [[rap metal]] band [[Methods of Mayhem]] and has pursued solo musical projects.
